channel.title: Text at top of screen showing servername and player online?
channel.description: Can anyone refer me to a tutorial that will show me how to write text to top of my private server screen?

item.title: Text at top of screen showing servername and player online?
item.dc:creator: @Nightz Nightz
item.description:
@Nightz wrote:

Yes, My fav is this one public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@gre@<<SERVERNAME>>", 15894); sendFrame126("", 15895); sendFrame126("", 15896); sendFrame126("", 15897); sendFrame126("", 15898); sendFrame126("', 15899); sendFrame126("", 15900); sendFrame126("", 15901); sendFrame126("", 15902); sendFrame126("", 15903); sendFrame126("", 15904); sendFrame126("", 15905); sendFrame126("", 15906); setInterfaceWalkable(15892); //default 13588 }

Read full topic
item.source: Text at top of screen showing servername and player online?

item.source: Text at top of screen showing servername and player online?

item.title: Text at top of screen showing servername and player online?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Add this void public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126("@whi@Your servername here", 13591); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " +players, 13592); sendFrame126("@whi@You are " + playerName!, 13593); sendFrame126("", 13595); sendFrame126("", 13596); sendFrame126("", 13597); sendFrame126("", 13598); sendFrame126("", 13599); sendFrame126("", 13600); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); } and then search for public boolean process and right under it add this writeplayers();

Read full topic
